src:
Matangkan Persiapan SEA Games 2019, Timnas Indonesia Jalani Uji Coba
06 Nov 2019, 17:36 by Anggi Tiar


Matangkan Persiapan SEA Games 2019, Timnas Indonesia Jalani Uji Coba

KBRN, Jakarta : Guna mematangkan persiapan menjelang SEA Games 2019 di Manila, Filipina, Tim Nasional (Timnas) Sepak Bola Indonesia U-23 dipastikan bakal melakoni dua laga uji coba internasional menghadapi Iran. Hal itu diungkapkan langsung Ketua Umum Persatuan Sepak Bola Seluruh Indonesia (PSSI), Mochaad Iriawan. Menurut pria yang akrab disapa Iwan Bule itu dua uji coba menghadapi Iran guna memenuhi target di pesta olahraga dua tahunan se-Asia Tenggara tersebut. Dua laga uji coba menghadapi Iran itu nantinya bakal digelar di dua tempat berbebeda. Partama laga akan digelar di Stadion Kapten I Wayan Dipta, Gianyar, Bali 13 November 2019. Sedangkan, laga kedua akan digelar di Stadion Pakansari, Cibinong, Kabupaten Bogor, Jawa Barat, 16 November 2019. "Mudah-mudahan kita bisa memenuhi target di SEA Games. Untuk itu kita perlu mematangkan persiapan tim," tegas Iriawan seperti dikutip rri.co.id dari situs resmi PSSI, Rabu (6/11/2019). Timnas putra yang dipoles pelatih Indra Sjafrie sebelumnya sudah beberapa kali menjalani laga uji coba. Tim ini bahkan sudah dipersiapkan sejak awal tahun lalu. Di awal tahun, tim Garuda membawa pulang gelar juara AFF U22. Mereka juga tampil di kualifikasi Piala Asia. Beberapa waktu lalu, tim ini juga berujicoba dengan mengikuti turnamen empat negara di China.Selain timnas U-23 putra, PSSI juga menyiapkan laga uji coba untuk Timnas Indonesia Putri yang juga akan turun di SEA Games 2019 tersebut. Rencananya, skuat asuhan Rully Nere itu bakal menguji kekuatan dengan melawan Srilanka pada 14 November 2019 di Jakarta.Sama hal-nya dengan Timnas Putra, Timnas Putri juga sudah dipersiapkan sejak lama. Tim asuhan Rully Nere itu mengikuti turnamen Piala AFF. Beberapa pemain timnas putri juga ditempa di kompetisi Liga 1 Putri. Saat ini, dua timnas tersebut sedang menjalani program pemusatan latihan. Timnas U23 di Jakarta, sedangkan Timnas Putri di Sawangan. Dua tim ini diharapkan bisa berbicara lebih di SEA Games nanti.
text:
Finalizing the 2019 SEA Games Preparation, Indonesian National Team Goes Out to Trial
Nov 6 2019, 17:36 by Anggi Tiar


Finalizing the 2019 SEA Games Preparation, Indonesian National Team Goes Out to Trial

KBRN, Jakarta: In order to finalize preparations ahead of the 2019 SEA Games in Manila, Philippines, the U-23 Indonesian Football National Team is certain to play two international test matches against Iran. This was revealed directly by the General Chair of the All Indonesian Football Association (PSSI), Mochaad Iriawan. According to the man who is familiarly called Iwan Bule, two trials against Iran to meet the target at the biennial sports event in Southeast Asia. Two trial matches against Iran will later be held in two different places. Partama's match will be held at the Captain I Wayan Dipta Stadium, Gianyar, Bali November 13, 2019. Meanwhile, the second match will be held at Pakansari Stadium, Cibinong, Bogor Regency, West Java, November 16, 2019. "Hopefully we can meet the target at SEA Games. For that we need to finalize the preparation of the team, "said Iriawan as quoted by rri.co.id from the official PSSI website, Wednesday (11/06/2019). The men's national team polished by coach Indra Sjafrie had previously undergone trial matches several times. This team has even been prepared since the beginning of last year. At the beginning of the year, the Garuda team took home the AFF U22 title. They also appeared in the Asian Cup qualifiers. Some time ago, this team also tested by participating in four countries' tournaments in China. In addition to the men's U-23 national team, PSSI also prepared a trial match for the Indonesian Women's National Team who will also be playing at the 2019 SEA Games. The plan, Rully Nere's squad will test its strength by fighting Sri Lanka on November 14, 2019 in Jakarta. The same thing with the Putra national team, Putri national team has also been prepared long ago. Rully Nere's team follows the AFF Cup tournament. Some of the women's national team players were also forged in the Women's League 1 competition. Currently, the two national teams are undergoing a training center program. The U23 national team in Jakarta, while the Putri national team in Sawangan. The two teams are expected to talk more at the SEA Games later.
